module.name: procedural_solid_model
module.keywords: module, solid, construction history, procedural, modified.
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the procedural modification of solids. Detailed definitions of the types of modification supported are defined in other modules which reference this module.

inscope.li: procedural solid models defined by their construction history;
modified solid models resulting from the application of local shape operations;
items within the scope of application module Procedural shape model, ISO/TS 10303-1317.

outscope.li: the definition of shape modification operations.

uof.name: Procedural_solid_model
uof.description: The Procedural_solid_model UoF specifies the data structure for the high level description of operations to modify solids by local shape operations. The basic modification operations are defined in the application modules which reference this module. This module provides a mechanism for associating a base solid with the solid resulting from the application of a shape modification operation. it also provides for the definition of a sequence of modification operations.
